sections.title: Further reading

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section consists of a list of further readings (references) without diagrams. Therefore, formatting requirements related to diagrams are not applicable.
As there are no diagrams in this section, the guideline for suggesting expansions to standard formatting is not applicable.

sections.meta_notes: The section contains references for further reading and does not include any diagrams; requirements related to diagram formatting are not applicable.
